title: Scandinavian almond biscuits
ingredients: ['125g butter', '200g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '225g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons milk', '50g flaked almonds', 'Almond icing', '125g icing sugar', '1/4 teaspoon almond extract', '4 tablespoons milk']
